text: idh qala l-lahu yaʿisa ib'na maryama udh'kur niʿ'mati ʿalayka waʿala walidatika idh ayyadttuka biruhi l-qudusi tukallimu l-nasa fi l-mahdi wakahlan wa-idh ʿallamtuka l-kitaba wal-hik'mata wal-tawrata wal-injila wa-idh takhluqu mina l-tini kahayati l-tayri bi-idh'ni fatanfukhu fiha fatakunu tayran bi-idh'ni watub'ri-u l-akmaha wal-abrasa bi-idh'ni wa-idh tukh'riju l-mawta bi-idh'ni wa-idh kafaftu bani is'raila ʿanka idh ji'tahum bil-bayinati faqala alladhina kafaru min'hum in hadha illa sih'run mubinun
